interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: AIKIMUSE 10 Piece Nude Matte Pigmented Lipstick Set,Gifts for Women,Velvet Lip Kit Gift Set With Moisturizer Smooth,Waterproof Long Lasting Beauty Cosmetics Makeup Liquid Lipstick Set,8.8 oz
Review Date: 2020/10/21
Store: AIKIMUSE
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'AIKIMUSE', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Liquid,Creamy', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting,Smoothening,Moisturizing,Clean,Long-lasting,Makeup', 'Package Dimensions': '7.44 x 7.05 x 3.11 inches; 9.91 Ounces', 'UPC': '887349696053'}
Review Text: Nice set of lipsticks! I love the packaging, it's very cute. The lipsticks in box set A is more of red colors and orange/coral color in box set B. The lipstick is very creamy, matte but it doesn't feel dry on my lips at all. But you definitely have to re-apply your lips after eating or drinking. And no these lipsticks aren't Nude color.
Review Title: Good sets of matte lipsticks
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
JOYYUM 1000W 2-in-1 Hot Air Spin Brush Styler Auto-rotating Negative Ionic Hair Curler Dryer Brush, 1 1/2 Inch and 2 Inch Brush Attachments, Lavander Fog
JOYYUM
{'Brand': 'JOYYUM', 'Material': 'Titanium', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Special Feature': 'Comb, Portable, Massage, Hot', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Curling', 'Package Dimensions': '16.3 x 5.4 x 3.2 inches; 1.85 Pounds', 'UPC': '787414814279', 'Manufacturer': 'JOYYUM'}
Do not like it. It barely spun or you have to use it with a very very small section of hair. Well, it's easy to use but I guess it's great for people with short hair.
Not for me
GIOVANNI Hemp Hydrating Hair Shine Spray, 4.3 oz. - Hemp Seed Oil, Aloe Vera, Frankincense Helps Stimulate Moisturize & Revitalize Damaged Hair, No Parabens, Color Safe, Lauryl & Laureth Sulfate Free
GIOVANNI
['GIOVANNI Hemp Hydrating Hair Shine Spray creates gloss that rocks, with a smooth surface that talks. This Mist will seal in any hairstyle, bridging the gap between natural and salon quality. GIOVANNI was the first full-range, salon-inspired hair-care brand in natural product stores, and today is the #1 selling Hair Care* lines in the United States Natural Products Industry. But before there was a brand, there was a pioneer. Arthur Guidotti had a vision and a love for all things hair. He began developing his passion as a hairstylist in Hollywood and Beverly Hills. By the 1960s, Arthur was maturing his talents and decided to open his own salon, called On Sunset. The salon was a bustling site, on the famous Sunset Strip, and a hit with many Hollywood celebrities, including Lucille Ball. Since 1979 the GIOVANNI Rule of Balance has been our commitment to make each product as pure and as natural as possible without sacrificing exceptional product performance. GIOVANNI is committed to creating only the highest-performance formulations, wrapped in aesthetically beautiful packaging and marketed with extraordinary visuals and graphics.*According to SPINs.']
{'Product Benefits': 'Frizz Control, Shine', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Frankincense', 'Liquid Volume': '5.6 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Spray', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 4.75 inches; 5.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': '18640', 'UPC': '716237186409', 'Manufacturer': 'AmazonUs/GIOR7', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'}
I like this hair conditioner. It smells ok. After first use, my hair was very soft and smooth. It is so easy to rinse off too.
Parabens and Sulfate Free hair conditioner
FRESHME Facial Sheet Masks - Hydrating Face Mask Allantoin Sodium Hyaluronate Aloe Vera and Punica Granatum Fruit Extract Moisturizing Plant Facial Mask, Combo 6 Pack
FRESHME
{'Brand': 'FRESHME', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Product Dimensions': '5.51 x 3.94 x 0.91 inches; 6.38 Ounces'}
I like these facial sheet mask. I used it for the first time last night before bed, it was easy to put it on my face. The essence absorbed into my skin quite fast, it didn't leave my face feeling dry at all. My face felt so smooth in the morning. However, instructions on the back of the packet didn't tell you how long you have to leave the mask on your face, I guess at least 15 minutes?
Facial sheet masks

Great buy!

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Type Preference:** The user is maintaining a strong interest in hair styling tools and care products that enhance shine and manageability, while also exploring versatile personal care and beauty items, such as makeup products. This broadens her focus to include multifunctional cosmetics, as evidenced by her recent purchase of a lip product set.

- **Performance Concern:** Her motivation remains centered around effectiveness and natural ingredients across all purchases. She continues to favor products that are free from parabens and sulfates, emphasizing her expectations for products that deliver on ease of use and overall performance.

- **Usage Experience:** The user appreciates user-friendly products that promote health and well-being. Her satisfaction with products that provide hydration and smoothness is now complemented by her exploration of makeup items that offer creamy textures and long-lasting wear, aligning with her desire for effective formulations in diverse categories.

- **Overall Satisfaction:** While maintaining a critical viewpoint, she generally enjoys positive experiences leading to favorable evaluations of high-quality products. Her discerning nature drives a continuous search for effective and reliable solutions across beauty and personal care.

- **Rating Trend:** The user exhibits a balanced evaluation style, considering both pros and cons in her reviews. Her recent experiences indicate an expanding interest in makeup products that combine functionality with aesthetic appeal, reinforcing her appreciation for high-performance formulations.
